subdisciplines.name: Drilling Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of engineering principles related to drilling wells for oil and gas exploration and production.

subdisciplines.name: Reservoir Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of the characteristics of oil and gas reservoirs to optimize the recovery of hydrocarbons.

subdisciplines.name: Production Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of optimizing the production of oil and gas reservoirs through the design and implementation of production systems.
